amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit HUD from using funds in the bill to enforce, implement, or administer the provisions of the March 17, 2000 settlement between Smith & Wesson and HUD.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section to the bill that prevents any funds from being used to enforce, implement, or administer the provisions of the March 17, 2000 settlement between the gun manufacturer Smith & Wesson and HUD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 219 (Roll no. 308).
